thread.title: This NSFW Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Will Make You Both Horny And Zen
thread.title_full: This NSFW Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Will Make You Both Horny And Zen

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This NSFW Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Will Make You Both Horny And Zen
text:
You may not have realized until now, but somewhere deep down, you've always wanted to watch a video featuring hot guys doing yoga in kilts out there in nature.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below And look, BBC Social has delivered just that, in a minute-long video that shows certified Forrest Yoga (a modern style of yoga developed by American yogini Ana T. Forrest that focuses on holding positions for long periods of time) instructor Finlay Wilson and model/ice hockey player Tristan Cameron-Harpe doing some seriously impressive moves. And they're doing Forrest Yoga, you know, in a forest! A snowy forest in the Scottish highlands, it looks like? The video has been viewed over 24 million times since it was posted on Monday, because it's wonderful. Sadly, Finlay and Tristan don't treat us to a floating lotus, but they do one hell of a handstand:
